thread.title: Brian Hoyer to keep starting QB job for Texans
thread.title_full: Brian Hoyer to keep starting QB job for Texans

title: Brian Hoyer to keep starting QB job for Texans
text:
Brian Hoyer to keep starting QB job for Texans By KRISTIE RIEKEN, AP Sports Writer Posted: 6:19 PM, October 19, 2015 Updated: 6:19 PM, October 19, 2015 More Sports Headlines Former Texans star Johnson returns to Houston with Colts 
HOUSTON (AP) - The Houston Texans have flip-flopped between Brian Hoyer and Ryan Mallett throughout the early part of this season. 
That indecision at quarterback appears to be over now after Hoyer's strong performance in Houston's win over the Jaguars on Sunday. 
"He's our quarterback," coach Bill O'Brien said. "We're going to stick with him. He's playing really well. He's playing at a high level, and we've got a lot of confidence in him." 
Hoyer made his second start this season on Sunday and it was the first time he both started and finished a game. 
He won the starting job out of camp, but was benched during the season opener after struggling early in that game. But Mallett had a tough time in his three starts and Hoyer took over in the last two of them before regaining the starting job last week. Copyright 2015 The Associated Press. All rights reserved.
